## isThreatenedBy() function

Checks if a target square is threatened by a square for a position, ignoring the current turn.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isThreatenedBy(board: Readonly<Board>, targetSquare: number, attackerSquare: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  board | Readonly&lt;Board&gt; |  |
|  targetSquare | number | Target square |
|  attackerSquare | number | Attacker square |

**Returns:**

boolean
